```{r significance, echo=F}
table_colnames<- c(" # Sig Clusters ", " # Clusters "," % Sig Clusters ", " Max Sig Unadj pval ","  # Informative Sig Clusters")

colnames(data)<-table_colnames
rownames(data) <- table_rownames
knitr::kable(data,format='html',align="c")
```
